room_title: Escape room "Operation: Casino" by Breakout Games - Pittsburgh in Pittsburgh
review: I really liked that some of the clues were tied to the theme of the room. Sometimes the puzzles and clues are totally unrelated to the theme and the theme is more decorative than anything. That was not the case for this room. Having some knowledge of casino games is beneficial though they do give instructions for those with no knowledge of how the games work.

room_title: Escape room "Operation: Casino" by Breakout Games - Pittsburgh in Pittsburgh
review: Our group of seven did Operation Casino and thoroughly enjoyed it. Concept was challenging but doable. Game master Joe was the BEST. He made us feel like geniuses after we broke out, referencing specific things we did particularly well. I want to go back and do the other rooms!

room_title: Escape room "Operation: Casino" by Breakout Games - Pittsburgh in Pittsburgh
review: We loved our first Breakout game (Operation: Casino) and game master (Peter), that we ended up doing all 6 rooms they offered in one weekend. It was definitely an enjoyable place to spend a considerable amount of time at! The rooms are all themed differently, and come with their own new set of challenges and quirks. The attention to detail was spectacular, the puzzles were top-notch, and the decor helped build the sense of being in another time and place.  There was honestly never a dull moment while we were in their rooms! We can't wait for them to release more, because we can't wait to go back! Special shout out to Peter, Nick, Spencer and Meg who put up with our team, as well as helped us maintain our 10/10 room winning streak for my birthday weekend!

room_title: Escape room "Operation: Casino" by Breakout Games - Pittsburgh in Pittsburgh
review: We had so much fun playing Operation: Casino! We escaped with just 3 min to spare. Totally going again!!!!

room_title: Escape room "Operation: Casino" by Breakout Games - Pittsburgh in Pittsburgh
review: We just finished the Casino Room and it was a blast! Staff was very friendly and courteous. I would recommend Breakout Pittsburgh to anyone looking for a fun time! We will be back!
